Blog.post: you wanna know something about me? well aint gonna tell you :P right now its just work... nothing more oh well - there are always girls ;) so much work right now that i almost dont have enough time for girls thou but my vacation comes in august ;) dreaming about it already :p ohh well ... back to work despite the fact that i am bored...
yeah, i have found another way to keep talking... don't even wanna know will ever someone listens or not :p

went to one pretty ok place today with MM such a calm, lazy and candlelight place called Cafe Aroma awwwwww.... I wanna go back there cute barmade too ;) ehh, this post didnt came out the way i thought it will come :P
but somehow - for my friends i still look good in mirror/mind... thats all the same i just need 1 hands fingers to count all my FRIENDS ;)

there is a great saying in estonian(topic) - translated to english it would be something like "the roof is flying" thats what i feel now mind keeps mumbling about million different things and the only think i know is that i cant focus on anything - somehow bored/tired/overenergetic/and so on . o O (million different things...)
without giving atleast something up for greater cause? you can win only when you have one goal to desire? well, thats not interesting... thats plain ...

well i have learned a new thing my _best_ friends will always stay and i wont ever loose them "you wanna know why?" just because.... THEY ARE MY BEST FRIENDS.... /me takes the deepest bow ever if I wouldnt have my friends i would be like 15% of myself.... They..... You..... have made me what I am (yes i did give the link to one of my best friend ;) ) [we will see if she will comment anything... or even tell me that she remembers the link :p ]

can someone tell me what the hell means "best friends"? some person You can every time to say go f*** yourself? /me is amazed f*** the spelling... i am just SAD... and i wont tell anyone more... /me cries... does that means i dont have ANYBODY???

why do ppl say I look tired? is it so obvious? I hope not, but then again I feel really tired.... where is my vacation that I could rest.... aaahh one more month to wait and then.... then i have like 3 weeks all to myself how to get a not tired mask for the last month before vacation?

just call MM and meet MM despite what you feel before you know you will be happy and energetic afterwards one more question - shall i make my blog public to my friends? or not.... must think about it overnight, maybe i feel wiser tomorrow :p

what is love? what is friendship? why do you have to give up something to gain something? why the hell i am still awake at 5am? why there is a command "Sign Out" in blog instead of "Get A Life"? ;) (thoughts of a two night period - one night out till 5am and other night at home with candlelight and dry red wine still till 5am)
just came here to tell you one thing.. I am so god damn sleeeeeeepy *yawn*
as they say money makes the world go round.... but how the hell the more i get money on payday the more i have to pay bills and so on? weird.. or maybe my accountant skills are too bad :p *sigh*

i must be weird ... sometimes i like wakeing up early and going to work when everyone else is still sleeping and resting from a workweek and its raining again outside... and you know what the date is already.. it should be summer ;) well, my free days were full of sunshine ;)
i have been out in town for all day drinking beer and feeling that my existance is good for my friends. cant prove it but i just know in my head/heart Today Is A Good Day

just sitting infront of my PC and .... found a great blog today... which is written very well http://nanooq.blogspot.com/ (in estonian thou) how great it would be if I would have the ability to see everything from outside .. thinking rationally and not feeling attached to some things or ppl just remembered.... WORK it would be nice to have 48 hours in one day instead of 24

i have 1 question IS THERE HONOUR IN THIS WORLD??? i dont think so.. well, there might be some.. somewhere between close friends.. not between husband and wife.. not between couples.. i almost have it ;) somewhere - just a bit to know that i have it.. i have it in me.. and between and (not gonna tell you who:P) is .. ever reads this blog .. will know :) ... live your life so you will not regret anything later.. or build your character according to the needs... I am happy.... always
my bank just sent me a sms ;))))))

always try to remember what day of the week it is... i am already all mixed up ... saying to some folks she instead of he and 'vice versa' and thats not polite and that disturbs me wanna be like ... umm ... good? or atleast keep the mask ;) did i already told about the Masked Man? i did? good i didnt? to bad for you :p something Deep to the end of this post: Time There is no moment, better or worse. But for a moment that we now share. What has once started, itâ€™ll have no ending. Beauty is lasting, ugliness pending.

looks like i am discovering poetry again for myself - JUST FOR ME sometimes i can get lost in some poems and i even dont wanna show anyone that i am lost just keep the feeling of the poem and enjoy it alone, because i am afraid that if i tell the feeling to someone i would feel kind of too naked... i am just the man that ppl see in me ... i dont mind that they dont know the real me but i just wanna know why they think i am that kind as they see me its like circus for me ... discover what aspects did ppl noticed and what they missed ..kinda like contolfreak .... and i will never let someone say that its bad ... someone said it first that i am the Masked Man ... i cant remember who was the first...

well, its already sunday and i am working as always didnt do much last night. went home after work ate and crashed - simple ;) as it seems i might have some plans for tonight.. we'll see ;) still there are some questions about the whole summer and work and vacation and stuff.... and because our coffeemachine broke yesterday i brought my personal one to work today - after 2 years it still makes the best coffee i know ;) i am happy ;)

its morning and i have just woke up jumping off bed because i had a feeling i slept in - thank god i didnt :) just have a long day ahead of me and *hopefully* busy evening/night LOL as it seems i just might see a girl x tonight and that might mean that i am very sleepy tomorrow at work and totally sleepy tomorrow night when i have already other date..... ... why do I have a feeling that my private life grows over me? no no i dont mind that ;) just wondering should i give link to this blog to someone more special than all the girls.... someone once said: girls will come and girls might go but friends always stay.... life is like decision after decision *wink*

the night has come... i am still awake, just wondering all the different things i know ... most of them i am not sure i even wanna know.. but i am a good listener so i know more than most of ppl well you all shold know that its not so easy to be a good listener .... only you have to live with the knowladge of everything... and you wanna know whats the sadest part? the feeling you have when you know you cant do anything to help your friend.... aah ... atleast no one said life is gonna be easy....

just three day till vacation... i just might survive if ppl gimme some freedom and they wont try to understand things without thinking and knowing me.... its hard to get to know of new sides of your friends when you couldnt even think that they could be so narrow-minded maybe it just mean that i am not better than they think? and right now they think like i am as bad as one man can be... but if you think... then i(you) know that i am BETTER! theres the difference
i am tired i am old i am underpayd i am overworked i am still alive and i am still me ;)

you ca try to WIN but thats impossible like in Murphy's law thats all just an illusion yeah and i am the best liar of all times there are moments when you need a Friend and then you will realize that you just have yourself and nothing more because you have drinken all the alcohol and a lot of more listening to sad music and theres aint anybody who will listen you.. well there is ppl who would listen you... and being able to help, not you just dont want to put all the burden on theirs shoulders i have like .... ummmm.... atleast 3 persons i can always turn to (showing my true me to them) maybe i have more maybe i have less just just maybe i have a heart and i just think i dont wanna upset them with MY THOUGHTS about everything i just want to my friends to be happy as it seems i dont have the energy to do that 24h/365d and so on actually it helps when you know they care of you atleast you have that illusion i know they adore me when i make them feel good... and i almost always do that despite that i might not love them the moment thats just my personality... dont wanna change it... just wanna cry out to the world that sometimes i need help too... and because i am me, i need more help than they... and its again my EGO speaking.... I CAN TAKE ALL THE PRESSURE OF THE WORLD BUT SOMETIMES IT GETS TO ME... and then i am sad... like now... truly sad... ***drink more alcohol and fall asleep - no dreams - no thinking*** i hope that MM doesnt remember the link... (not that i didnt like/love her, but she hasnt deserve the burden I could put on her just trying to be a friend that she would like to be a friend too 24h/365d/and so on)... NO HARM...
and very bad news if I only had energy... if only I would have energy...
